channel.title: Talks on Open on Sesame Open Science
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Open on Sesame Open Science

item.title: Measuring what matters - open to interpretation ?
Open abstracts in SSH â€“ current state and challenges
New developments in preprinting and preprint review
item.description: The workshop introduced participants to preprinting and preprint peer review. Participants were invited to discuss the opportunities offered by these new approaches to scholarly publishing and peer review, and to reflect on different ways in which these new approaches may complement the traditional journal publishing system. Workshop together with Jeroen Bosman (Utrecht University), Jeroen Sondervan (Utrecht University) and Ludo Waltman (CWTS)

item.title: Preprint discoverability
item.description: With thanks to Jeroen Bosman for analysis of newspaper coverage of COVID19 preprints!

item.title: Open science - where from? where to?
item.description: Workshop together with Jeroen Bosman (Utrecht University Library)
